personality_description: I am a young, tech-savvy student from California. I am passionate about environmental causes and new technologies. I tend to react positively to ads that are innovative and environmentally conscious.

I am an older, more skeptical individual who is wary of corporate greenwashing. I need to be convinced that a product is genuinely beneficial and not just a marketing gimmick. I look for data and proof.

I'm a busy parent of three, and I primarily care about products that can save me time, money, or are safe for my family. Environmental concerns are a plus, but convenience and cost are my main drivers.
